name: Shrepe
description: The dogs have barked, the frogs have croaked. It's time for the ogre- lord of all memecoins to take over. This is our swamp now. Most memecoins are one-dimensional. $SHREPE is different. It has layers. Like an onion. Or an ogre. tired of the fleeting hype and the shallow trends. It's time for a coin with substance, with story, with SWAMP. ca:BiGwCbrNetFGJYZMRJiPMEo3vf5XnLp7ibc1CtmuQGW4 Shrepe is the misunderstood hero of the blockchain, here to protect his territory and reward his loyal followers. Somebody once told me this was the coin to rule them all. How To Buy 1. Set Up Your Wallet Download Phantom or your wallet of choice from the app store or Google Play. For desktop users, get the Phantom Google Chrome extension from Phantom.com. 2. Get Some SOL You'll need SOL in your wallet to swap for $SHREPE. You can buy SOL directly on Phantom, transfer it from another wallet, or buy on an exchange and send it to your new wallet address. 3. Go to Raydium Connect to Raydium by going to Raydium.io in your browser or within the Phantom app's browser. Connect your wallet. Paste the $SHREPE contract address into the swap form, select $SHREPE, and confirm. When Phantom prompts you for a signature, sign the transaction. 4. Swap SOL for $SHREPE Swap your SOL for $SHREPE. We've made it simple. No complex fairy tales here, just a straight path to the swamp. Tokenomics Ticker SHREPE Supply 1,000,000,000 100% Liquidity Pool 0% Team Tokens It's all ogre now.
